sentences.en: All of these aspects provide us new viewpoints and angles on exploring the serf - esteem .
sentences.cn: 这些都为我们理解和探讨 自尊 提供了新的观点和视角.

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages, a lord and a serf had very different places in life.
sentences.cn: 中世纪, 农奴主和农奴在生活中是两个截然不同的阶级.

sentences.en: Last week, we have a debate on whether middlel school students should serf the internet.
sentences.cn: 1上周我们举行了一次关于中学生是否应该上网的辩论.

sentences.en: Serf - owners had a firm grip on the birth, death and marriage of serfs.
sentences.cn: 农奴主掌握着农奴生 、 死、婚、嫁大权.

sentences.en: Serf owners regarded their serfs as animals that could talk.
sentences.cn: 农奴主把农奴当做会说话的牲口.

sentences.en: The cruel serf - owner put out the serf's eyes.
sentences.cn: 残忍的 农奴主 挖掉了农奴的眼睛.

sentences.en: The serf - owners had the right to beat , abuse or even kill the serfs at will.
sentences.cn: (那时) 农奴主 有权任意打骂甚至杀害农奴.

sentences.en: The serf an assured existence, the proletarian has not.
sentences.cn: 农奴生活有保障, 无产者生活无保障.

sentences.en: The serf was beaten up by her owner and passed out for two hours.
sentences.cn: 这位农奴挨农奴主毒打,昏迷了两个小时.

sentences.en: They laid the blame on the serf and beat him brutally.
sentences.cn: 他们赖到这个农奴身上,把他毒打了一顿.

trans.tran_cn: 农奴，奴隶，像农奴般遭受奴役的人
trans.tran_en: someone in the past who lived and worked on land that they did not own and who had to obey the owner of the land
